com.token.manager

Class TokenManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.token.manager.TokenManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITokenManager

    public class TokenManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITokenManager
    Author:
    Anshul token manager links the database to DtuPayApp. Acts as an intermediate between both.
